verses.verse: I have <S%H935>come<s%> into my <S%H1588>garden,<s%> my <S%H269>sister,<s%> my <S%H3618>bride.<s%> I have <S%H717>gathered<s%> my <S%H4753>myrrh<s%> with my <S%H1313>spice;<s%> I have <S%H398>eaten<s%> my <S%H3293>honeycomb<s%> with my <S%H3293>honey;<s%> I have <S%H8354>drunk<s%> my <S%H3196>wine<s%> with my <S%H2461>milk.<s%> Friends <S%H398>Eat,<s%> <S%H7453>friends!<s%> <S%H8354>Drink,<s%> <S%H7937>yes,<s%> drink abundantly, <S%H1730>beloved.<s%> Beloved

I was <S%H3463>asleep,<s%> but my <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H5782>awake.<s%> It is the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H1730>beloved<s%> who <S%H1849>knocks:<s%> <S%H6605>"Open<s%> to <S%H269>me,<s%> my sister, my <S%H7474>love,<s%> my <S%H3123>dove,<s%> my <S%H8535>undefiled;<s%> for my <S%H7218>head<s%> is <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H2919>dew,<s%> and my <S%H6977>hair<s%> with the <S%H7447>dampness<s%> of the <S%H3915>night.<s%>"

I have taken <S%H6584>off<s%> my <S%H3801>robe.<s%> <S%H349>Indeed,<s%> must I put it <S%H3847>on?<s%> I have <S%H7364>washed<s%> my <S%H7272>feet.<s%> <S%H349>Indeed,<s%> must I soil <S%H2936>them?<s%>
My <S%H1730>beloved<s%> thrust his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H7971>in<s%> <S%H4480>through<s%> the <S%H2356>latch<s%> <S%H4578>opening.<s%> My heart pounded for <S%H1993>him.<s%>

I rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H6605>open<s%> for my <S%H1730>beloved.<s%> My <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H5197>dripped<s%> with <S%H4753>myrrh,<s%> my <S%H676>fingers<s%> with <S%H5674>liquid<s%> <S%H4753>myrrh,<s%> on the <S%H3709>handles<s%> of the <S%H4514>lock.<s%>

I <S%H6605>opened<s%> to my <S%H1730>beloved;<s%> but my <S%H1730>beloved<s%> <S%H5674>left;<s%> and had <S%H5674>gone<s%> <S%H5315>away.<s%> My heart went <S%H3318>out<s%> when he <S%H1696>spoke.<s%> I <S%H1245>looked<s%> for <S%H4672>him,<s%> but I didn't find <S%H7121>him.<s%> I called <S%H6030>him,<s%> but he didn't answer.

The <S%H8104>watchmen<s%> who go <S%H5437>about<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H5221>me.<s%> They beat <S%H6481>me.<s%> They bruised <S%H8104>me.<s%> The keepers of the <S%H2346>walls<s%> took my <S%H7289>cloak<s%> away from <S%H5375>me.<s%>

I <S%H7650>adjure<s%> <S%H1323>you,<s%> daughters of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> If you <S%H4672>find<s%> my <S%H1730>beloved,<s%> that you <S%H5046>tell<s%> him that I am <S%H2470>faint<s%> with <S%H160>love.<s%> Friends

How is your <S%H1730>beloved<s%> better than another <S%H1730>beloved,<s%> you <S%H3303>fairest<s%> among <S%H802>women?<s%> How is your <S%H1730>beloved<s%> better than another <S%H1730>beloved,<s%> that <S%H3602>you<s%> do so adjure <S%H7650>us?<s%> Beloved
My <S%H1730>beloved<s%> is <S%H6703>white<s%> and <S%H122>ruddy.<s%> The <S%H1713>best<s%> among ten <S%H7233>thousand.<s%>
His <S%H7218>head<s%> is like the <S%H3800>purest<s%> <S%H6337>gold.<s%> His <S%H6977>hair<s%> is <S%H8534>bushy,<s%> <S%H7838>black<s%> as a <S%H6158>raven.<s%>
His <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are like <S%H3123>doves<s%> beside the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H650>brooks,<s%> <S%H7364>washed<s%> with <S%H2461>milk,<s%> mounted like <S%H3427>jewels.<s%>

His <S%H3895>cheeks<s%> are like a <S%H6170>bed<s%> of <S%H1314>spices<s%> with towers of <S%H4840>perfumes.<s%> <S%H4026><s%> His <S%H8193>lips<s%> are like <S%H7799>lilies,<s%> <S%H5197>dropping<s%> <S%H5674>liquid<s%> <S%H4753>myrrh.<s%>

His <S%H3027>hands<s%> are like <S%H1550>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H4390>set<s%> with <S%H8658>beryl.<s%> His <S%H4578>body<s%> is like <S%H8127>ivory<s%> <S%H6247>work<s%> <S%H5968>overlaid<s%> with <S%H5601>sapphires.<s%>

His <S%H7785>legs<s%> are like <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of <S%H8336>marble<s%> <S%H3245>set<s%> on <S%H134>sockets<s%> of fine <S%H6337>gold.<s%> His <S%H4758>appearance<s%> is like <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> <S%H977>excellent<s%> as the <S%H730>cedars.<s%>

His <S%H2441>mouth<s%> is <S%H4477>sweetness;<s%> <S%H4261>yes,<s%> he is altogether lovely. This is my <S%H1730>beloved,<s%> and this is my <S%H7453>friend,<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
